alert.note: Alert for Broward; Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 7:13PM EDT until September 19 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Miami-Dade County in southeastern Florida... Southern Broward County in southeastern Florida... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 713 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley to 8 miles west of Intersection Krome And U.S. 27 to 6 miles east of Shark Valley Obs Tower, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie and Kendall. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
